security: Not applicable, as the document is a list of files without specific content provided.
summary: This is a file index from the House Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA) related to Valery Vladimirov Kostikov, listing documents from the State Department and FBI.
summary_one_paragraph: This file from the House Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA) contains an index of documents related to Valery Vladimirov Kostikov, spanning from 1959 to 1975. The file includes materials from the State Department in Moscow, Tijuana, and Mexico City, as well as documents from the FBI in Oklahoma City, San Diego, and San Antonio. The documents pertain to subjects like TUMBLEWEED and KOSTIKOVA and consist of memos, airgrams, and travel items.
title: KOSTIKOV, VALERY VLADIMIROV
sender: House Select Committee on Assassinations Staff Members
